extracted_playbook.title: Update goTenna Android Pro and iOS Pro
extracted_playbook.description: Update goTenna Android Pro and iOS Pro applications to version 2.0.3 or greater to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Discreet Callsigns and Key Names
extracted_playbook.description: Choose callsigns and key names that do not disclose sensitive information, such as location, team size, or team name.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure End-User Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement strong security measures on all end-user devices, including the use of encryption and ensuring regular software updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Key Rotation Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly rotate encryption keys according to industry best practices to maintain ongoing security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Share Encryption Keys via QR Code
extracted_playbook.description: Utilize QR codes for the secure exchange of encryption keys, similar to ATAK.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Broadcasting
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure secure broadcasting by transmitting keys at a reduced power of 0.5 Watts in a secured area.

extracted_playbook.title: Leverage Layered Encryption
extracted_playbook.description: Implement layered encryption keys to securely manage communications with individuals or teams.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.
